metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45413 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Using the S.browser_fallback_url parameter parameter, anattacker could redirect a user to a URL and cause SameSite=Strict cookiesto be sent.
*This issue only affects Firefox for Android. Otheroperating systems are not affected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox <107.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
